CustomField.description: MLF Customization Fall 2024. Field introduced so we can surface this field on the Volunteer Shift Object to enable filtering on this field within Volunteer Shift List Views
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, indicates the Job associated to this Shift has been marked as a Private Event Job so the Job and its associated Shifts will not be displayed on the Volunteer Portal. Reference Only. Not Editable.
CustomField.label: Private Event (Job Level)
